  • Method Details

    • initialization

      @BeforeEach public void initialization()

    • testAddStudents

      @ParameterizedTest @MethodSource("addStudentsArguments") public void testAddStudents(Map<it.polimi.ingsw.model.Clan,Integer> addingStudents)
      test to check if addStudents add the students in an empty Island Is expected that all the students are added in the Island
      Parameters:
      addingStudents - students to add to the island and set the initial condition

    • testRemoveStudents

      @ParameterizedTest @MethodSource("removeStudentsArguments") public void testRemoveStudents(Map<it.polimi.ingsw.model.Clan,Integer> addingStudents, Map<it.polimi.ingsw.model.Clan,Integer> remove, Map<it.polimi.ingsw.model.Clan,Integer> expectedStudents)
      test if removeStudents remove the students from the Island. In the first case the behavior of the method under normal conditions is analyzed, removing from an island a number of students actually present there. All selected students are expected to be removed from the island. In the second case, an attempt is made to remove a greater number of students than the one on the island. The number of students removed from the island is expected to be that of students that were on the island.
      Parameters:
      addingStudents - students to add to the island and set the initial condition
      remove - students to remove from the island
      expectedStudents - students expected to be present on the island after calling the removeStudents method

    • testAddStudent

      @ParameterizedTest @MethodSource("addStudentArguments") public void testAddStudent(Map<it.polimi.ingsw.model.Clan,Integer> addingStudents, int expectedResult)
      testAddStudent method tests if the AddStudent method add a student of a particular chosen clan on the Island
      Parameters:
      addingStudents - students to add to the island and set the initial condition
      expectedResult - students expected to be present on the island after calling the addStudent method

    • testAddProhibitionCard

      @Test public void testAddProhibitionCard()
      test that the addProhibitionCard method add a prohibition card on an Island

    • testRemoveProhibitionCard

      @Test public void testRemoveProhibitionCard()
      test if the method removeProhibitionCard remove a prohibition card from the Island if the card is present

    • testRemoveTooMuchProhibition

      @Test public void testRemoveTooMuchProhibition()
      test that if the method removeProhibitionCard doesn't do anything if if there are no Prohibition Card on the Island

    • testMerge

      @ParameterizedTest @MethodSource("MergeTestArguments") public void testMerge(Map<it.polimi.ingsw.model.Clan,Integer> addingStudentsFirstIsland, Map<it.polimi.ingsw.model.Clan,Integer> addingStudentsSecondIsland, Map<it.polimi.ingsw.model.Clan,Integer> studentsExpected)
      test if the merge method unifies the islands by adding the students present on each one, just as the unified island will have the sum of the number of prohibition cards present on the individual islands
      Parameters:
      addingStudentsFirstIsland - students to add to the first island and set the initial condition
      addingStudentsSecondIsland - students to add to the second island and set the initial condition
      studentsExpected - students expected to be present on the island after the merge of the two islands
